page.title: 06The Forestry, Horningsham
page.content:
The {forestry}in Horningsham extends over 4,000 acres and employs twenty-eight people. The forestry delivers logs, pea sticks, fencing and Christmas trees to customers within a fifty mile radius. The forestry has its own garage to maintain its fleet of sixteen vehicles. There are 3,000 acres of softwood trees, mainly spruce and 1,000 acres of hardwood trees. There is a large creosoting shed that can handle several tons of wood a day.
The whole forestry operation is owned and operated by the{Longleat Estate.
